result.title: Starting out with codeforces.
result.content:
Just started working on codeforces problem-set recently. I really like the website. It would have been great if the code we wrote ran in a 64-bit environment as opposed to a 32-bit environment. I use Rust and got bit assuming usize was 64-bit. I had to explicitly use u64.

I am solving the problems at codeforces in descending order of num-solved. So, I am solving the easier problems first. I like the fact that the problems have tags letting you know what to expect in the problem. Even the so-called easier problems are not too-easy, there is usually a trick or two to get the problem right.

If you are a Rust enthusiast (or not), consider adding me as a friend.

Happy Problem Solving! 20180319_25.
